official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Army, acting through the Chief of Engineers, to carry out a project along the Martin Pena Canal in the area of San Juan, Puerto Rico.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Army, through the Chief of Engineers, to remove silt and debris from and along the Martin Pena Canal near San Juan, Puerto Rico.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Army, acting through the Chief of Engineers, to carry out a project along the Martin Pena Canal in the area of San Juan, Puerto Rico.
